verses.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
From the evil of that which He created
And from the evil of darkness when it settles
verses.transliteration: Wa min sharri ghasiqin iza waqab

verses.translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
verses.transliteration: Wa min shar ri haasidin iza hasad
